trait.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
entries: The champion rerolls a failed saving throw.

trait.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the champion can regain 20 hit points.

trait.name: Lightning Strike
entries: As a bonus action, the champion targets a creature within 30 feet the creature must make a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 5d6} lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The champion makes three attacks with its greatsword or its shortbow.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}31 ({@damage 7d6 + 7}) lightning damage

action.name: Hurl Lightning
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 12} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 7d6}) lightning damage.
